header: I'm a software developer with experience in building web applications. I specialize in both frontend and backend development, with experience in modern web technologies such as Django, Nest.js, Next.js, React.
frontend: As a frontend developer, I have a keen eye for design and user experience, and I'm passionate about creating beautiful and intuitive interfaces that make the web a better place. I'm comfortable working with various frontend frameworks such as Next.js, React and Tailwind CSS.
backend: As a backend developer, I enjoy building scalable and robust server-side applications that power the frontend. I have experience in various programming languages such as Javascript, Python and have experience in working with databases such as Postgresql, MySQL and Redis.
